abstract: Rich Ross, president of Disney Channels Worldwide, will have many challenges at the troubled Walt Disney Studios.
snippet: Rich Ross, president of Disney Channels Worldwide, will have many challenges at the troubled Walt Disney Studios.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The Walt Disney Company has hired one of its star television executives to overhaul its struggling motion picture studio.

headline.main: Disney Selects Successful TV Executive to Turn Around Its Struggling Movie Studio
headline.print_headline: Disney Selects Successful TV Executive to Turn Around Its Struggling Movie Studio

abstract: Zac Efron weighs in with a pat on the back for Rich Ross.
snippet: Zac Efron weighs in with a pat on the back for Rich Ross.
lead_paragraph: As Hollywood chews over what obligatory congratulations gift to send Rich Ross, the Disney Channel president who was just named as the new chairman of Walt Disney Studios, a real life movie star has weighed in on the promotion.

headline.main: A ‘High School’ Star Gives Ross a Boost
